title: Improve run_test.py to support running individual test classes and methods
body_html:
Added support in run_test.py for running individual test classes and methods.

The -i/--include option can specify a list of test modules, classes or methods like this:

python run_test.py -i autograd torch.TestTorch.test_abs torch.TestTorch.test_add utils.TestBottleneck

-f, -l and -x behaviour stays the same as before
body_text:
Added support in run_test.py for running individual test classes and methods.
The -i/--include option can specify a list of test modules, classes or methods like this:
python run_test.py -i autograd torch.TestTorch.test_abs torch.TestTorch.test_add utils.TestBottleneck
-f, -l and -x behaviour stays the same as before
body:
Added support in run_test.py for running individual test classes and methods.

The -i/--include option can specify a list of test modules, classes or methods like this:

```shell
python run_test.py -i autograd torch.TestTorch.test_abs torch.TestTorch.test_add utils.TestBottleneck
```
-f, -l and -x behaviour stays the same as before
